typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LaboratoryValue
typeDescription.description: The actual laboratory value containing the concept and additional information.

featureDescription.name: fact
featureDescription.description: Measurement or numeric value of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: factAssessment
featureDescription.description: A optional relative assessment of the fact.

featureDescription.name: lowerLimit
featureDescription.description: Lower reference value of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: upperLimit
featureDescription.description: Upper reference value of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: interpretation
featureDescription.description: Interpretation of fact depending on reference values or interpretation in text.

featureDescription.name: qualitativeValue
featureDescription.description: Qualitative value of the actual laboratory value, e.g. positive, negative.

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Laboratory value belongs to patient or other person. Possible values are 'RECIPIENT', 'DONOR' or 'FAMILY'.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.Limit
typeDescription.description: Limit value from text or external source.

featureDescription.name: externalSource
featureDescription.description: Information about limit value from external source.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LabValueIgnore
typeDescription.description: Helper type for representing text spans that should be ignored by the pattern building LaboratoryValue.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PriorLabValueIndicator
typeDescription.description: Helper type for representing text spans that indicating a prior LaboratoryValue.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoLaboratoryValue
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that this span is no part of a laboratory value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoLaboratoryValueContext
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby span is no part of a lab value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoLaboratoryValueContextBlocker
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby context is applicable for changing the semantic of the lab value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.LaboratoryValueContext
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby span is part of a lab value.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.TransplantationRoleIndicator
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying the role of a person, e.g. recipient/donor.
